array.item: A superset of C that adds a full new language - templates. These can create completely new types based on another input type.
An attempt at making a better C. Instead of inheritance, Rust prefers traits.
Another attempt at a better C. Zig goes for a purist C approach, primarily adding on a proper @import system and metaprogramming capabilities.
Yet another attempt at a better C. Zag attempts to take Zig\'s formula and "Zag" off in another direction. Zag adds a simpler syntax and better macro/metaprogramming features.
